title: Did an AI Hallucination Help Convict Fugees Rapper Pras?
description: Pras Michel's new counsel filed for a fresh trial, claiming the AI tool and his previous legal team were ineffective in the Fugees star's conspiracy case.

title: SBF Trial – FTX general counsel had ‘no idea’ that SBF was misusing customer funds
description:
The final day of Sam Bankman-Fried’s (SBF) trial brought further revelations about what transpired behind the scenes at the exchange as former FTX attorney Can Sun took the stand as the day’s first witness. Sun’s testimony revolved around FTX Digital Markets’ terms of service and their pivotal role in the ongoing trial. SBF has publicly […]

The post SBF Trial – FTX general counsel had ‘no idea’ that SBF was misusing customer funds appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Billionaire ‘Bond King’ Jeffrey Gundlach Warns US Dollar’s Reserve Currency Status at Risk Due to Rising National Debt
description: Renowned billionaire Jeffrey Gundlach, also known as the “Bond King,” has raised concerns over the potential risk to the U.S. dollar’s reserve currency status due to rising national debt. “The future of the U.S. dollar, and possibly out-of-control inflation, depends on getting the budget and spending under control,” Gundlach warned.
